arts.ttl: Major injury update from Brighton will have one Wolves star very relieved
arts.sum: Kaoru Mitoma is another star player for Brighton, and with Matt Doherty out injured, Jackson Tchatchoua could step in to combat him. Jackson Tchatchoua and Hugo Bueno will be hoping Yankuba Minteh plays on the opposite wing

arts.ttl: Wolves v Brighton preview: Vitor Pereira confident in Wolves resurgence
arts.sum: The Seagulls arrive at Molineux on Sunday and find a Wolves team bottom of the Premier League and without a win, despite an improved performance and point against Spurs last time out. “Each day, each training session, what I see is my team working a lot, with responsibility, trying to prove that we deserve more than this," he said.

arts.ttl: Chris Sutton has now delivered his ‘brave’ score prediction for Wolves vs Brighton
arts.sum: The Opta supercomputer has predicted Wolves vs Brighton, and now Chris Sutton has also delivered his verdict ahead of this weekend’s clash. Brighton will be a difficult game for Wolves, but the Old Gold will be hoping to cause an upset on Sunday afternoon.
